entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cummins Lakes (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:51 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -25.3°C
